This flux should be reproducible by differencing the sum of all carbon pools (cVeg, cLitter, cSoil, and cProducts or equivalently cLand) from one time step to the next, except in the case of lateral transfer of carbon due to harvest, riverine transport of dissolved organic and/or inorganic carbon, or any other process (in which case the lateral\_carbon\_transfer\_over\_land term, see below, will be zero data).-

Title: Ocean Salt Y Transport
Description: Contains all contributions to 'y-ward' salt transport from resolved and parameterized processes.
Processing Note: time-mean on ocean grid

Title: Sinking Particulate Iron Flux
Description: In accordance with common usage in geophysical disciplines, "flux" implies per unit area, called "flux density" in physics.   'Sinking' is the gravitational settling of particulate matter suspended in a liquid. A sinking flux is positive downwards and is calculated relative to the movement of the surrounding fluid.
Processing Note: Those who wish to record vertical velocities and vertical fluxes on ocean half-levels may do so. If using CMOR3 you will be required to specify artificial bounds (e.g. located at full model levels) to avoid an error exit.

Title: Upwelling Longwave Flux over Sea Ice
Description: the upwelling longwave flux over sea ice (always negative)

Title: Sea Surface Salinity
Description: Sea water salinity is the salt content of sea water, often on the Practical Salinity Scale of 1978. However, the unqualified term 'salinity' is generic and does not necessarily imply any particular method of calculation. The units of salinity are dimensionless and the units attribute should normally be given as 1e-3 or 0.001 i.e. parts per thousand.
Processing Note: Report on native horizontal grid as well as on a spherical latitude/longitude grid.

Title: Sea Water Volume
Description: Total volume of liquid sea water.

Title: Surface Total Alkalinity
Description: total alkalinity equivalent concentration (including carbonate, borate, phosphorus, silicon, and nitrogen components)

Title: surface albedo of ocean without ice
Description: similar to the proposal of surface albedo of land without ice, but for ocean that is not covered by ice

Title: Maximum Wind Speed of Gust at 100m
Description: Wind speed gust maximum at 100m above surface

Title: Sea-Ice Area Flux Through Straits
Description: Flux across 4 straits

Title: Geopotential Height at 500hPa
Description: geopotential height on the 500 hPa surface

Title: Anthropogenic Heat Flux Generated from non-Renewable Human Primary Energy Consumption
Description: Anthropogenic heat flux generated from non-renewable human primary energy consumption, including energy use by vehicles, commercial and residential buildings, industry, and power plants.  Primary energy refers to energy in natural resources, fossil and nonfossil, before conversion into other forms, such as electricity.

Title: Surface Downward Mass Flux of Carbon-14 as Abiotic 14CO2 [kgC m-2 s-1]
Description: Gas exchange flux of abiotic 14CO2 (positive into ocean)

Title: Near-Surface Specific Humidity
Description: Near-surface (usually, 2 meter) specific humidity.
CMIP7 Variable Groups: baseline_daily, temperature_variability_daily_highpriority, DAMIP_daily, aerchemmip_2d_daily, biodiv_land_daily, ISIMIPMinimalAtmos, CFMIP_baseline, cordex [test], paleo_permafrost, tipmip_baseline
Processing Note: normally, report this at 2 meters above the surface
Priority 1 (CMIP6): CFMIP, CMIP, CORDEX, DAMIP, GMMIP, HighResMIP, RFMIP, VIACSAB, VolMIP

Title: Surface Upwelling Shortwave Radiation
Description: This is the 3-hour mean flux.

Title: Mean Age of Snow
Description: When computing the time-mean here, the time samples, weighted by the mass of snow on the land portion of the grid cell, are accumulated and then divided by the sum of the weights.  Reported as "missing in regions free of snow on land.

Title: Zonal mean tendency of air temperature due to shortwave heating, all sky
Description: Zonal mean tendency of air temperature due to shortwave heating, all sky, with the extended number of vertical levels.

Title: Carbon Mass Flux into Atmosphere Due to Crop Harvesting [kgC m-2 s-1]
Description: Carbon mass flux per unit area due to crop harvesting

Title: Precipitation
Description: Total precipitation flux

Title: Secondary Organic Aerosol Mass Mixing Ratio
Description: Mass fraction in the atmosphere of secondary organic aerosols (particulate organic matter formed within the atmosphere from gaseous precursors; dry mass).

Title: Surface Mass Concentration of Calcareous Phytoplankton Expressed as Chlorophyll in Sea Water
Description: chlorophyll concentration from the calcite-producing phytoplankton component alone

Title: ua200
Description: Zonal wind at 200 hPa, 6hourly instantaneous

Title: C3H6 Volume Mixing Ratio
Description: Mole fraction is used in the construction mole\_fraction\_of\_X\_in\_Y, where X is a material constituent of Y.

Title: Northward Component of the Eliassen-Palm Flux
Description: zonal mean; hence YZT

Title: 6 hourly instantaneous eastward wind in the UTLS region
Description: 6 hourly instantaneous eastward wind at 3 pressure levels in the UTLS region (100, 150 and 225 hPa)
Processing Note: subset of 27 pressure levels to cover the UTLS region

Title: Grid-Cell Area for Ocean Variables
Description: Cell areas for any grid used to report ocean variables and variables which are requested as used on the model ocean grid (e.g. hfsso, which is a downward heat flux from the atmosphere interpolated onto the ocean grid). These cell areas should be defined to enable exact calculation of global integrals (e.g., of vertical fluxes of energy at the surface and top of the atmosphere).
CMIP7 Variable Groups: baseline_fixed, ocean_coordinates, ocean_grid, Bjerknes_Index_ENSO, marine_bgc_baseline, paleo_fx, seaice_budget_mass_monthly, seaice_budget_area_monthly, seaice_budget_energy_monthly, seaice_state_monthly_basic, seaice_dynamics_basic, seaice_dynamics_advanced, seaice_budget_freshwater_monthly, seaice_state_monthly_advanced, seaice_state_daily_basic, marine_bgc_seaice, seaice_bgc_daily, seaice_budget_energy_daily, seaice_state_daily_advanced, omip_geometry_physics
Processing Note: For oceans with more than 1 mesh (e.g., staggered grids), report areas that apply to surface vertical fluxes of energy.

Title: Phytoplankton Carbon Concentration
Description: sum of phytoplankton carbon component concentrations.  In most (all?) cases this is the sum of phycdiat and phycmisc (i.e., "Diatom Carbon Concentration" and "Non-Diatom Phytoplankton Carbon Concentration"

Title: Irrigation Flux Including any Irrigation for Crops, Trees, Pasture, or Urban Lawns
Description: Mass flux of water due to irrigation.

Title: Tendency of Specific Humidity Due to Numerical Diffusion
Description: This includes any horizontal or vertical numerical moisture diffusion not associated with the parametrized moist physics or the resolved dynamics.  For example, any vertical diffusion which is part of the boundary layer mixing scheme should be excluded, as should any diffusion which is included in the terms from the resolved dynamics.   This term is required to check the closure of the moisture budget.

Title: Pressure at Model Full-Levels
Description: The atmospheric pressure at the model layer midpoints for all times and levels in the associated output variables

Title: Wet Deposition Rate of Dry Aerosol Total Organic Matter
Description: Deposition rate of organic matter in aerosols (measured by the dry mass) due to wet processes

Title: Net Carbon Mass Flux into Atmosphere Due to Land-Use Change [kgC m-2 s-1]
Description: Net Carbon Mass Flux into Atmosphere due to Land Use Change

Title: Tendency of Specific Humidity
Description: Tendency of Specific Humidity

Title: Tendency of Air Temperature Due to Stratiform Clouds and Precipitation
Description: alevel site time1

Title: Sea-Ice Area Percentage (Atmospheric Grid)
Description: Percentage of grid cell covered by sea ice

Title: Surface Mole Concentration of Diazotrophs Expressed as Carbon in Sea Water
Description: carbon concentration from the diazotrophic phytoplankton component alone

Title: Mass of 13C in Soil Pool
Description: Carbon-13 mass content per unit area in soil.

Title: TOA outgoing longwave flux assuming reference methane field
Description: This is the outgoing longwave flux at the top-of-atmosphere for all-sky conditions from a diagnostic call to the radiation scheme using a reference methane field

Title: Surface Upward Sensible Heat Flux
Description: The surface sensible heat flux, also called turbulent heat flux, is the exchange of heat between the surface and the air by motion of air.
CMIP7 Variable Groups: baseline_monthly, radiativeforcing_monthly, DAMIP_monthly, Bjerknes_Index_ENSO, poleward_heat_transports, aerchemmip_2d_monthly, paleodata_assimilation, DCPP_Essential, paleo_cryosphere, SO_BGC-cloud_met_monthly, FireMIP_monthly, seaice_budget_energy_monthly, CFMIP_baseline, paleo_permafrost, landice_glaciers_allfreq, paleo_cryosphere_high_priority

Title: Land Ice Area Percentage
Description: fraction of grid cell occupied by "permanent" ice (i.e., glaciers).
Processing Note: For atmospheres with more than 1 mesh (e.g., staggered grids), report areas that apply to surface vertical fluxes of energy.

Title: Stratospheric Ozone Tracer Volume Mixing Ratio
Description: Ozone tracer intended to map out strat-trop exchange (STE) of ozone.

Title: Surface Downwelling Shortwave Radiation
Description: Surface solar irradiance for UV calculations.

Title: Carbonate Ion Concentration
Description: Mole concentration (number of moles per unit volume: molarity) of the carbonate anion (CO3).
Processing Note: The variable at the depth of 200 meters is requested.

Title: Transpiration
Description: Transpiration (may include dew formation as a negative flux).

Title: Freshwater Flux from Sea-Ice Surface
Description: Total flux of fresh water from sea-ice surface into underlying ocean. This combines both surface melt water that drains directly into the ocean and the drainage of surface melt pond. By definition, this flux is always positive.

Title: Surface Concentration of Sea-Salt Aerosol
Description: mass concentration of sea-salt dry aerosol in air in model lowest layer

Title: Eastward Acceleration Due to Non-Orographic Gravity Wave Drag
Description: lower priority

Title: Surface wind speed Northward Component
Description: **vas:** Northward component of wind at 10 meters above the surface. It measures wind speed in the north-south direction (positive values indicate wind blowing toward the north).

Title: Height of Shrubs
Description: Vegetation height averaged over the shrub fraction of a grid cell.

Title: Near-Surface Air Temperature
Description: near-surface (usually, 2 meter) air temperature
CMIP7 Variable Groups: baseline_daily, clouds_basic_average, temperature_variability_daily_highpriority, synoptic_systems_high_priority, dynvar_basic, DAMIP_daily, aerchemmip_2d_daily, DCPP_Essential, paleo_land_atmosphere_surface, HeatHealthExpandedDaily, CHELSA_land_daily, biodiv_land_daily, baseline-daily, ISIMIPMinimalAtmos, CFMIP_baseline, cordex [test], paleo_permafrost, tipmip_baseline, landice_glaciers_allfreq
Processing Note: normally report this at 2 meters above the surface
Priority 1 (CMIP6): AerChemMIP, CFMIP, CMIP, CORDEX, DAMIP, DCPP, DynVarMIP, GMMIP, HighResMIP, PAMIP, PMIP, RFMIP, VIACSAB, VolMIP

Title: Detrital Organic Carbon Concentration
Description: sum of detrital organic carbon component concentrations
Processing Note: Concentrations of all 3D tracers in the uppermost ocean layer. See first table in Oyr for a complete list of these tracers.  "Tracer"  concentations should be reported even if they are diagnosed rather than prognostically calculated.

Title: Snow Mass Rate of Change Through Wind Drift of Snow
Description: the rate of change of snow mass through wind drift of snow (from sea-ice into the sea) divided by sea-ice area

Title: TOA outgoing shortwave flux assuming clear-sky and reference methane field
Description: This is the outgoing shortwave flux at the top-of-atmosphere for clear-sky conditions from a diagnostic call to the radiation scheme with a reference methane field

Title: Tendency of Specific Humidity Due to Stratiform Cloud and Precipitation and Boundary Layer Mixing
Description: To be specified only in  models which do not separate budget terms for stratiform cloud, precipitation and boundary layer schemes.  Includes all bounday layer terms including and diffusive terms.

Title: TOA Incident Shortwave Radiation
Description: Shortwave radiation incident at the top of the atmosphere

Title: Convective Snowfall Flux
Description: convective precipitation of all forms of water in the solid phase.
Processing Note: report on model half-levels

Title: Water Evaporation from Soil
Description: includes sublimation.

Title: Net Primary Mole Productivity of Carbon by nanophytoplankton
Description: Vertically integrated primary (organic carbon) production by the nanophytoplankton component alone

Title: Ambient Aerosol Optical Thickness at 550nm
Description: AOD from the ambient aerosols in clear skies if od550aer is for all-sky (i.e., includes aerosol water).  Does not include AOD from stratospheric aerosols if these are prescribed but includes other possible background aerosol types. Needs a comment attribute "wavelength: 550 nm"

Title: Pressure on Model Half-Levels
Description: Air pressure on model half-levels
Processing Note: This field is needed only for models in which the pressure cannot be calculated from the vertical coordinate information stored already for each variable.  Thus, the pressures are needed for height or theta-coordinate models, for example, but not sigma- or eta-coordinate models.

Title: Percentage Cover by Primary Evergreen Trees
Description: fraction of entire grid cell  that is covered by primary evergreen trees.
Processing Note: Note that if this variable is independent of time, it should be stored only for a single time (user choice).

Title: Convective Cloud Cover Percentage
Description: Convective cloud fraction

Title: Air Temperature
Description: Air Temperature

Title: Eastward Gravity Wave Drag
Description: Parameterised x-component of gravity wave drag

Title: Surface Mole Concentration of Carbonate Ion in Equilibrium with Pure Aragonite in Sea Water
Description: Near surface mole concentration (number of moles per unit volume: molarity) of the carbonate anion (CO3) for sea water in equilibrium with pure Aragonite. Aragonite  (CaCO3) is a mineral that is a polymorph of calcium carbonate.

Title: Tendency of Sea Water Conservative Temperature Expressed as Heat Content Due to Parameterized Mesoscale Diffusion
Description: Tendency of heat content for a grid cell from parameterized mesoscale eddy diffusion. Reported only for models that use conservative temperature as prognostic field.

Title: Precipitation
Description: at surface; includes both liquid and solid phases.  This is the 3-hour mean precipitation flux.
CMIP7 Variable Groups: baseline_subdaily, clouds_basic_average, landatm_coupling_3hA, synoptic_systems_high_priority, urban_impacts_essential, ISIMIP3hourlyAtmos

Title: Convective Condensed Water Path
Description: Convective Condensed Water Path

Title: X-Component of Land Ice Vertical Mean Velocity
Description: The vertical mean land ice velocity is the average from the bedrock to the surface of the ice

Title: Near-Surface Wind Speed
Description: This is the mean of the speed, not the speed computed from the mean u and v components of wind
Processing Note: This table includes the 2-D variables listed in the "Amon" spreadsheet, omitting, however, the daily maximum and minimum temperatures.  All variables should be reported as synoptic fields, not daily means.

Title: Sea Water Pressure at Sea Floor
Description: "Sea water pressure" is the pressure that exists in the medium of sea water.  It includes the pressure due to overlying sea water, sea ice, air and any other medium that may be present.
Processing Note: CMIP5 had units of dbar.  CMIP6 uses Pa. Report on native horizontal grid as well as on a spherical latitude/longitude grid.

Title: Fraction of Time Convection Occurs in Cell
Description: Fraction of time that convection occurs in the grid cell .
Processing Note: This table includes the 2-D variables listed in the "Amon" spreadsheet, omitting, however, the daily maximum and minimum temperatures.  All variables should be reported as synoptic fields, not daily means.

Title: Nitrogen Mass in Products of Land-Use Change
Description: Report missing data over ocean grid cells. For fractional land report value averaged over the land fraction.

Title: Surface Downward Flux of O2
Description: Gas exchange flux of O2 (positive into ocean)

Title: Total Nitrogen Lost to the Atmosphere (Including NHx, NOx, N2O, N2) from Fire
Description: Flux of Nitrogen from the land into the atmosphere due to fire

Title: TOA Outgoing Clear-Sky Shortwave Radiation
Description: Calculated in the absence of clouds.

Title: Mean Age of Stratospheric Air
Description: The mean age of air is defined as the mean time that a stratospheric air mass has been out of contact with the well-mixed troposphere.

Title: Net Primary Production on Land as Carbon Mass Flux [kgC m-2 s-1]
Description: "Production of carbon" means the production of biomass expressed as the mass of carbon which it contains. Net primary production is the excess of gross primary production (rate of synthesis of biomass from inorganic precursors) by autotrophs ("producers"), for example, photosynthesis in plants or phytoplankton, over the rate at which the autotrophs themselves respire some of this biomass. "Productivity" means production per unit area. The phrase "expressed\_as" is used in the construction A\_expressed\_as\_B, where B is a chemical constituent of A. It means that the quantity indicated by the standard name is calculated solely with respect to the B contained in A, neglecting all other chemical constituents of A.
Processing Note: needed for any model that does not compute GPP

Title: Heterotrophic Respiration on Shrub Tiles as Carbon Mass Flux [kgC m-2 s-1]
Description: Total RH of shrubs in the grid cell

Title: PM2.5 Mass Mixing Ratio
Description: Mass fraction atmospheric particulate compounds with an aerodynamic diameter of less than or equal to 2.5 micrometers

Title: Tendency of Air Temperature Due to Clear Sky Shortwave Radiative Heating
Description: zonal mean; hence YZT

Title: Column Integrated Mass Flux
Description: Column integrated mass flux

Title: Ice Sheet Mass That Does not Displace Sea Water
Description: Greenland

Title: Sensible Heat Flux on Land-Use Tile
Description: Upward sensible heat flux on land use tiles. The surface sensible heat flux, also called turbulent heat flux, is the exchange of heat between the surface and the air by motion of air.

Title: Ridged Ice Thickness
Description: Sea Ice Ridge Height (representing mean height over the ridged area)
Cross-thematic group review comment: MJ: simple change from existing monthly variable to daily.

Title: Bolus ocean velocity in the eastward direction
Description: The bolus (also referred to as parameterised) ocean velocity in the eastward direction.

Title: Hydrometeor Effective Radius of Convective Cloud Ice
Description: This is defined as the in-cloud ratio of the third moment over the second moment of the particle size distribution (obtained by considering only the cloudy portion of the grid cell).

Title: Depth of 20 degree Celsius Isotherm
Description: This quantity, sometimes called the "isotherm depth", is the depth (if it exists) at which the sea water potential temperature equals some specified value. This value should be specified in a scalar coordinate variable. Depth is the vertical distance below the surface. Potential temperature is the temperature a parcel of air or sea water would have if moved adiabatically to sea level pressure.

Title: Convective Cloud Area Percentage
Description: Include only convective cloud.

Title: Net Shortwave Surface Radiation
Description: Net shortwave radiation

Title: lake emission rate of CH4
Description: This is the emission rate of methane (CH4) into the atmosphere from freshwater lakes

Title: Northward Ocean Heat Transport Due to Parameterized Mesoscale Advection
Description: Contributions to heat transport from parameterized mesoscale eddy-induced advective transport. Diagnosed here as a function of latitude and basin.  Use Celsius for temperature scale.
Processing Note: For models which do not have a Cartesian lat-long grid, this transport can be approximated as thetransport across zig-zag paths corresponding to latitudes with spacing between latitudes appropriate tothe model's resolution, as is done for the ocean meridional overturning mass streamfunction.

Title: Daily Dry Deposition Rate of NH4
Description: Daily Dry Deposition Rate of NH4

Title: Detrital Organic Carbon Concentration
Description: sum of detrital organic carbon component concentrations

Title: Ocean Vertical Momentum Diffusivity Due to Tides
Description: Diffusivity is also sometimes known as the coefficient of diffusion. Diffusion occurs as a result of a gradient in the spatial distribution of mass concentration, temperature or momentum.  The diffusivity may be very different in the vertical and horizontal directions. The construction vertical\_X\_diffusivity means the vertical component of the diffusivity of X due to motion which is not resolved on the grid scale of the model. "Due to tides" means due to all astronomical gravity changes which manifest as tides. No distinction is made between different tidal components. The specification of a physical process by the phrase due\_to\_process means that the quantity named is a  single term in a sum of terms which together compose the general quantity  named by omitting the phrase.

Title: daily ocean_heat_y_transport
Description: Contains all contributions to "y-ward" heat transport from resolved and parameterized processes. Use Celsius for temperature scale.
Processing Note: 2d field for CMIP6. Report on native horizontal grid. Online mapping to depth/pressure vertical grid if depth or pressure are not native.

Title: Precipitation
Description: at surface; includes both liquid and solid phases from all types of clouds (both large-scale and convective)

Title: Cloud Droplet Number Concentration of Stratiform Cloud Tops
Description: This variable represents the monthly mean Cloud Droplet Number Concentration of Stratiform Cloud Tops

Title: Surface Upwelling Clear-Sky Shortwave Radiation
Description: Surface Upwelling Clear-sky Shortwave Radiation
Processing Note: This table includes the 2-D variables listed in the "Amon" spreadsheet, omitting, however, the daily maximum and minimum temperatures.  All variables should be reported as synoptic fields, not daily means.

Title: Eastward Gravity Wave Drag
Description: Parameterised x-component of gravity wave drag

Title: Sinking Particulate Organic Phosphorus Flux
Description: In accordance with common usage in geophysical disciplines, "flux" implies per unit area, called "flux density" in physics.   'Sinking' is the gravitational settling of particulate matter suspended in a liquid. A sinking flux is positive downwards and is calculated relative to the movement of the surrounding fluid.
Processing Note: Those who wish to record vertical velocities and vertical fluxes on ocean half-levels may do so. If using CMOR3 you will be required to specify artificial bounds (e.g. located at full model levels) to avoid an error exit.

Title: Primary Carbon Production by Phytoplankton
Description: total primary (organic carbon) production by phytoplankton

Title: wet deposition of HNO3
Description: This is the loss rate of nitric acid (HNO3) from the atmosphere due to wet deposition

Title: Downwelling Clear-Sky, Aerosol-Free Shortwave Radiation
Description: Calculated in the absence of aerosols and clouds (following Ghan). This requires a double-call in the radiation code with precisely the same meteorology.

Title: Pressure on Model Half-Levels
Description: The atmospheric pressure at the model layer interfaces for all times and levels in the associated output variables

Title: Percentage Cloud Cover
Description: Includes both large-scale and convective cloud.

Title: Maximum PBL Height
Description: maximum boundary layer height during the day (add cell\_methods attribute: "time: maximum")

Title: Isotopic Ratio of Oxygen-18 in Sea Water
Description: Ratio of abundance of oxygen-18 (18O) atoms to oxygen-16 (16O) atoms in sea water

Title: Abiotic Delta Pco Partial Pressure
Description: Difference in partial pressure of abiotic-analogue carbon dioxide between sea water and air.  The partial pressure of a dissolved gas in sea water is the partial pressure in air with which it would be in equilibrium. An abiotic analogue is used to simulate the effect on a modelled variable when biological effects on ocean carbon concentration and alkalinity are ignored.
Processing Note: Difference between atmospheric and oceanic partial pressure of CO2 (positive meaning ocean > atmosphere) - abiotic component

Title: Net Conductive Heat Flux in Ice at the Surface
Description: the net heat conduction flux at the ice surface

Title: Sea Water Potential Temperature
Description: Diagnostic should be contributed even for models using conservative temperature as prognostic field.
Processing Note: The variable at the depth of 200 meters is requested.

Title: Optical Thickness at 443nm Dust
Description: Total aerosol AOD due to dust aerosol at a wavelength of 443 nanometres.

Title: Upwelling Clear-Sky Shortwave Radiation
Description: Includes also the fluxes at the surface and TOA.

Title: dry deposition of NO3 aerosol
Description: This is the loss rate of nitrate (NO3) aerosol from the atmosphere due to dry deposition

Title: Loss of Stratospheric Methane by all chemical destruction
Description: This is the loss rate of stratospheric methane by all chemical destruction. The distinction between the stratosphere and troposphere should be consistent with the tropopause as used in the calculation of the tropopause pressure (ptp).

Title: Tendency of Air Temperature Due to Shortwave Radiative Heating
Description: alevel site time1

Title: Sea Water Surface Downward Y Stress
Description: This is the stress on the liquid ocean from overlying atmosphere, sea ice, ice shelf, etc.
Processing Note: Report on native horizontal grid.

Title: Abiotic Dissolved Inorganic Carbon Concentration
Description: Abiotic Dissolved inorganic carbon (CO3+HCO3+H2CO3) concentration
Processing Note: Concentrations of all 3D tracers in the uppermost ocean layer. See first table in Oyr for a complete list of these tracers.  "Tracer"  concentations should be reported even if they are diagnosed rather than prognostically calculated.

Title: Tendency of Sea Water Conservative Temperature Expressed as Heat Content Due to Parameterized Eddy Advection
Description: Tendency of heat content for a grid cell from parameterized eddy advection (all forms of eddy advection). Reported only for models that use conservative temperature as prognostic field.
Processing Note: Report on native horizontal grid. Online mapping to depth/pressure vertical grid if depth or pressure are not native.

Title: Carbon Mass in Other Living Compartments on Land
Description: Carbon Mass in Other Living Compartments on Land

Title: Calcite Production
Description: Production rate of Calcite, a mineral that is a polymorph of calcium carbonate. The chemical formula of calcite is CaCO3.

Title: CALIPSO Low Level Cloud Cover Percentage
Description: Percentage cloud cover in layer centred on 840hPa

Title: Ocean Heat X Transport
Description: Contains all contributions to "x-ward" heat transport from resolved and parameterized processes.  Use Celsius for temperature scale.
Processing Note: 2d field for CMIP6. Report on native horizontal grid. Online mapping to depth/pressure vertical grid if depth or pressure are not native.

Title: Planetary albedo
Description: This is a band average value for the planetary albedo

Title: Mineral Ammonium in the Soil
Description: SUM of ammonium over all soil layers

Title: Upwelling Clear-Sky Longwave Radiation
Description: Upwelling clear-sky longwave radiation  (includes the fluxes at the surface and TOA)
Processing Note: Report on model half-levels (i.e., interfaces between model layers).

Title: Tendency of Sea Water Conservative Temperature Expressed as Heat Content Due to Residual Mean Advection
Description: Conservative Temperature is defined as part of the Thermodynamic Equation of Seawater 2010 (TEOS-10) which was adopted in 2010 by the International Oceanographic Commission (IOC). The phrase "residual mean advection" refers to the sum of the model's resolved advective transport plus any parameterized advective transport. Parameterized advective transport includes processes such as parameterized mesoscale and submesoscale transport, as well as any other advectively parameterized transport. When the parameterized advective transport is represented in the model as a skew-diffusion rather than an advection, then the parameterized skew diffusion should be included in this diagnostic, since the convergence of skew-fluxes are identical (in the continuous formulation) to the convergence of advective fluxes.

Title: Sea-Ice Mass Change from Thermodynamics
Description: Total change in sea-ice mass from thermodynamic processes divided by grid-cell area

Title: Aqueous-Phase Production Rate of SO4
Description: proposed name: tendency\_of\_atmosphere\_mass\_content\_of\_sulfate\_dry\_aerosol\_due\_to\_aqueous\_phase\_net\_chemical\_production

Title: Surface Mass Concentration of Total Phytoplankton Expressed as Chlorophyll in Sea Water
Description: sum of chlorophyll from all phytoplankton group concentrations at the sea surface.  In most models this is equal to chldiat+chlmisc, that is the sum of "Diatom Chlorophyll Mass Concentration" plus "Other Phytoplankton Chlorophyll Mass Concentration"

Title: Net Primary Organic Carbon Production by Diatoms
Description: Primary (organic carbon) production by the diatom component alone

Title: CALIPSO Low Level Cloud Cover Percentage
Description: CALIPSO Low Level Cloud Fraction

Title: Tendency of Sea Water Salinity Expressed as Salt Content Due to Parameterized Eddy Advection
Description: Tendency of salt content for a grid cell from parameterized eddy advection (any form of eddy advection).

Title: Surface Temperature
Description: quantity averaged over ice sheet (grounded ice sheet and floating ice shelf) only. Needed to analyse the impact of downscaling methods

Title: Height of Boundary Layer
Description: Height of Boundary Layer

Title: Mass of 13C in Litter Pool
Description: Carbon-13 mass content per unit area litter (dead plant material in or above the soil).

Title: PAN Volume Mixing Ratio
Description: Mole fraction is used in the construction mole\_fraction\_of\_X\_in\_Y, where X is a material constituent of Y.

Title: Load of Sea-Salt Aerosol
Description: The total dry mass of sea salt aerosol particles per unit area.

Title: SO2 Volume Mixing Ratio
Description: Mole fraction is used in the construction mole\_fraction\_of\_X\_in\_Y, where X is a material constituent of Y.

Title: Dissolved Organic Carbon Concentration
Description: Sum of dissolved carbon component concentrations explicitly represented (i.e. not ~40 uM refractory unless explicit)
Processing Note: Concentrations of all 3D tracers in the uppermost ocean layer. See first table in Oyr for a complete list of these tracers.  "Tracer"  concentations should be reported even if they are diagnosed rather than prognostically calculated.

Title: Mass of Salt in Sea Ice per Area
Description: Total mass of all salt in sea ice divided by grid-cell area
Processing Note: Total mass of all salt in sea ice divided by grid-cell area
Cross-thematic group review comment: MJ: simple change from existing monthly variable to daily.

Title: C3 Natural Grass Area Percentage
Description: Percentage of entire grid cell covered by C3 natural grass.

Title: Sea-Ice Extent North
Description: Total area of all Northern-Hemisphere grid cells that are covered by at least 15 % areal fraction of sea ice

Title: Land Ice Calving Flux
Description: Loss of ice mass resulting from iceberg calving. Computed as the rate of mass loss by the ice shelf (in kg s-1) divided by the horizontal area of the ice sheet (m2) in the grid box.

Title: Mass Concentration of Picophytoplankton Expressed as Chlorophyll in Sea Water
Description: chlorophyll concentration from the picophytoplankton (<2 um) component alone
Processing Note: Concentrations of all 3D tracers in the uppermost ocean layer. See first table in Oyr for a complete list of these tracers.  "Tracer"  concentations should be reported even if they are diagnosed rather than prognostically calculated.

Title: Ice Sheet Surface Ice Melt Flux
Description: quantity averaged over ice\_sheet (meaning grounded ice sheet and floating ice shelf) only, to avoid contamination from other surfaces (eg: permafrost)

Title: Daily Maximum O3 Volume Mixing Ratio in Lowest Model Layer
Description: maximum near-surface ozone  (add cell\_methods attribute "time: maximum")

Title: Transformed Eulerian Mean Northward Wind
Description: zonal mean; hence YZT

Title: Surface Diffuse Downwelling Shortwave Radiation
Description: This is a 3-hour mean flux.

Title: Tendency of Sea Water Salinity Expressed as Salt Content
Description: Tendency of salt content for a grid cell from all processes.
Processing Note: Report on native horizontal grid. Online mapping to depth/pressure vertical grid if depth or pressure are not native.

Title: Sea-Ice Speed
Description: Speed of ice (i.e. mean absolute velocity) to account for back-and-forth movement of the ice

Title: Bare Soil Percentage Area Coverage
Description: Percentage of entire grid cell  that is covered by bare soil.

Title: Carbon concentration of diazotrophs
Description: carbon concentration of diazotrophs
Processing Note: Analogous to Oday.phyc

Title: Bacterial Carbon Concentration
Description: sum of bacterial carbon component concentrations
Processing Note: Concentrations of all 3D tracers in the uppermost ocean layer. See first table in Oyr for a complete list of these tracers.  "Tracer"  concentations should be reported even if they are diagnosed rather than prognostically calculated.

Title: Specific Humidity
Description: zonal mean; hence YZT

Title: Surface Upward Latent Heat Flux
Description: This is the 3-hour mean flux.

Title: Surface Snow and Ice Sublimation Flux
Description: The snow and ice sublimation flux is the loss of snow and ice mass from the surface resulting from their conversion to water vapor that enters the atmosphere.
Processing Note: This table includes the 2-D variables listed in the "Amon" spreadsheet, omitting, however, the daily maximum and minimum temperatures.  All variables should be reported as synoptic fields, not daily means.

Title: Ice Sheet Surface Downwelling Shortwave Radiation
Description: quantity averaged over ice\_sheet (meaning grounded ice sheet and floating ice shelf) only, to avoid contamination from other surfaces (eg: permafrost)

Title: Interception Evaporation
Description: liquid\_water\_evaporation\_flux\_from\_canopy

Title: Tendency of Sea Water Conservative Temperature Expressed as Heat Content Due to Parameterized Eddy Advection
Description: Tendency of heat content for a grid cell from parameterized eddy advection (any form of eddy advection). Reported only for models that use conservative temperature as prognostic field.

Title: Downward Heat Flux at Sea Water Surface
Description: This is the net flux of heat entering the liquid water column through its upper surface (excluding any "flux adjustment") .

Title: Bedrock Altitude
Description: The bedrock topography beneath the land ice

Title: Primary Organic Carbon Production by Phytoplankton Based on Nitrate Uptake Alone
Description: Vertically integrated primary (organic carbon) production by phytoplankton based on nitrate uptake alone

Title: Convective Cloud Emissivity
Description: This is the in-cloud emissivity obtained by considering only the cloudy portion of the grid cell.

Title: Primary Organic Carbon Production by All Types of Phytoplankton
Description: Vertically integrated total primary (organic carbon) production by phytoplankton. This should equal the sum of intpdiat+intpphymisc, but those individual components may be unavailable in some models.

Title: Net Primary Mole Productivity of Carbon by coccolithophores
Description: Vertically integrated primary (organic carbon) production by the coccolithophores component alone

Title: Daily Maximum Near-Surface Wind Speed
Description: Daily maximum near-surface (usually, 10 meters) wind speed.
CMIP7 Variable Groups: DAMIP_daily, DCPP_Essential, AgImpactsMisc, transport_impacts_essential, biodiv_land_daily_advanced, CFMIP_baseline
Processing Note: normally, report this at 10 meters above the surface

Title: Surface upward sensible heat flux
Description: Hourly surface upward sensible heat flux

Title: Rainfall Flux over Land Ice
Description: over Land Ice//quantity averaged over ice sheet (grounded ice sheet and floating ice shelf) only. Needed to analyse the impact of downscaling methods

Title: TOA Incident Shortwave Radiation
Description: As Amon.rsdt, but at daily resolution

Title: Mass Fraction of Rain in Air
Description: Rain mixing ratio

Title: Carbon Mass in Each Model Soil Level (Summed over All Soil Carbon Pools in That Level)
Description: for models with vertically discretised soil carbon, report total soil carbon for each level

Title: Near-Surface Specific Humidity on Land-Use Tile
Description: Normally, the specific humidity should be reported at the 2 meter height

Title: Percentage Cover of Sea Ice by Ridging
Description: Fraction of sea ice, by area, which is covered by sea ice ridges, giving equal weight to every square metre of sea ice .

Title: Downwelling Clear-Sky Shortwave Radiation
Description: Includes also the fluxes at the surface and TOA.

Title: Surface Downwelling Longwave Radiation
Description: Surface downwelling longwave radiation

Title: Pressure on Model Half-Levels
Description: Air pressure on model half-levels
Processing Note: provide this field for models in which the pressure cannot be calculated from the vertical coordinate information stored already for each variable.  Thus, the pressures are needed for height or theta-coordinate models, for example, but not sigma- or eta-coordinate models.

Title: Field Capacity
Description: Field Capacity

Title: 3-hourly v-wind at 100m
Description: 3-hourly v-wind at 100m

Title: Aragonite Production
Description: Vertically integrated aragonite production

Title: Daily Wet Deposition Rate of NH4
Description: Daily Wet Deposition Rate of NH4

Title: Snowfall Flux
Description: at surface; includes precipitation of all forms of water in the solid phase

Title: Basal Specific Mass Balance Flux of Grounded Ice Sheet
Description: quantity averaged over grounded land ice

Title: Grounded Ice Sheet Area Percentage
Description: Percentage of grid cell covered by grounded ice sheet

Title: Condensed Water Path
Description: calculate mass of condensed (liquid + ice) water in the column divided by the area of the column (not just the area of the cloudy portion of the column). This includes precipitating hydrometeors ONLY if the precipitating hydrometeors affect the calculation of radiative transfer in model.

Title: Eastward Wind
Description: Zonal wind (positive in a eastward direction).
Processing Note: on the following pressure levels: 850, 500, 250 hPa

Title: Geopotential Height at 1000hPa
Description: Geopotential height on the 1000 hPa surface

Title: Mole Concentration of Particulate Organic Matter Expressed as Phosphorus in Sea Water
Description: sum of particulate organic phosphorus component concentrations

Title: Open Water Evaporation
Description: liquid\_water\_evaporation\_flux\_from\_open\_water

Title: Tendency of Air Temperature Due to Numerical Diffusion
Description: alevel site time1

Title: Downwelling Longwave Radiation
Description: Fluxes are requested at all levels

Title: Air Pressure at Convective Cloud Base
Description: Where convective cloud is present in the grid cell, the instantaneous cloud base altitude should be that of the bottom of the lowest level containing convective cloud. Missing data should be reported in the absence of convective cloud. The time mean should be calculated from these quantities averaging over occasions when convective cloud is present only, and should contain missing data for occasions when no convective cloud is present during the meaning period.

Title: Total Emission Rate of SO2
Description: Integrate 3D emission field vertically to 2d field.

Title: Global Average Sea Water Potential Temperature
Description: Diagnostic should be contributed even for models using conservative temperature as prognostic field

Title: Daily-Mean Near-Surface Wind Speed
Description: near-surface (usually, 10 meters) wind speed.
CMIP7 Variable Groups: baseline_daily, temperature_variability_daily_lowpriority, DAMIP_daily, aerchemmip_2d_daily, AgModelExpandedDaily, AgImpactsMisc, transport_impacts_essential, HeatHealthExpandedDaily, CHELSA_land_daily, biodiv_land_daily, ISIMIPMinimalAtmos, CFMIP_baseline, paleo_permafrost, tipmip_baseline, landice_glaciers_allfreq
Processing Note: normally report this at 10 meters above the surface

Title: Evaporation Including Sublimation and Transpiration
Description: at surface; flux of water into the atmosphere due to conversion of both liquid and solid phases to vapor (from underlying surface and vegetation)
CMIP7 Variable Groups: baseline_monthly, DAMIP_monthly, aerchemmip_2d_monthly, paleodata_assimilation, DCPP_Essential, paleo_land_atmosphere_surface, FireMIP_monthly, biodiv_land_monthly, CFMIP_baseline, ref_atmosphere, paleo_permafrost, tipmip_baseline

Title: Product of Eastward Wind and Omega
Description: u\*omega

Title: Surface Mole Concentration of Carbonate Ion in Equilibrium with Pure Calcite in Sea Water
Description: Near surface mole concentration (number of moles per unit volume: molarity) of the carbonate anion (CO3) for sea water in equilibrium with pure calcite. Aragonite  (CaCO3) is a mineral that is a polymorph of calcium carbonate.

Title: CALIPSO Ice Cloud Percentage
Description: CALIPSO Ice Cloud Fraction

Title: Tropospheric loss of methane by OH
Description: This is the loss rate of tropospheric methane due to reaction with the hydroxy (OH) radical. The distinction between stratosphere and troposphere should be consistent with the tropopause used to calculate the pressure of the tropopause (ptp).

Title: Sea Water Salinity
Description: Sea water salinity is the salt content of sea water, often on the Practical Salinity Scale of 1978. However, the unqualified term 'salinity' is generic and does not necessarily imply any particular method of calculation. The units of salinity are dimensionless and the units attribute should normally be given as 1e-3 or 0.001 i.e. parts per thousand.
CMIP7 Variable Groups: baseline_monthly, DAMIP_monthly, surgemip_variables, paleodata_assimilation, marine_bgc_baseline, paleo_ocean_3D, DCPP_Wider, SO_BGC-cloud_ocean_monthly, fish_model_expand_mon, FireMIP_monthly, omip_scalar_fields, dynamical_downscaling_ocean_core, tipmip_baseline, omip_scalars_high_priority
Processing Note: Report on native horizontal grid as well as on a spherical latitude/longitude grid. Online mapping to depth/pressure vertical grid if depth or pressure are not native.

Title: Sea Area Percentage
Description: This is the area fraction at the ocean surface.
CMIP7 Variable Groups: baseline_fixed, paleo_fx, seaice_budget_mass_monthly, seaice_budget_area_monthly, seaice_budget_energy_monthly, seaice_state_monthly_basic, seaice_dynamics_basic, seaice_dynamics_advanced, seaice_budget_freshwater_monthly, seaice_state_monthly_advanced, seaice_state_daily_basic, marine_bgc_seaice, seaice_bgc_daily, seaice_budget_energy_daily, seaice_state_daily_advanced, omip_geometry_physics
Processing Note: Should this be recorded as a function of depth?  Report on the same grid that ocean fields are reported (i.e., the ocean native grid, or the grid that ocean data has been provided to CMIP.  For completeness, provide this even if the ocean grid is the same as the atmospheric grid.

Title: Surface Natural Carbonate Ion Concentration
Description: Near surface mole concentration (number of moles per unit volume: molarity) of the natural-analogue carbonate anion (CO3). A natural analogue is used to simulate the effect on a modelled variable of imposing preindustrial atmospheric carbon dioxide concentrations, even when the model as a whole may be subjected to varying forcings.

Title: High Frequency Ocean Surface Velocity
Description: This is just uo at high frequency so as to compute KE and vorticity.
Processing Note: Same as uo.  Surface values only.

Title: Tendency of Specific Humidity Due to Stratiform Clouds and Precipitation
Description: alevel site time1

Title: Tendency of Ocean Potential Energy Content
Description: Rate that work is done against vertical stratification, as measured by the vertical heat and salt diffusivity. Report here as depth integrated two-dimensional field.
Processing Note: Report on native horizontal grid.

Title: Downwelling Shortwave Radiation
Description: Downwelling shortwave radiation (includes the fluxes at the surface and top-of-atmosphere)
Processing Note: Report on model half-levels (i.e., interfaces between model layers).

Title: Virtual Salt Flux Correction
Description: It is set to zero in models which receive a real water flux.
Processing Note: Report on native horizontal grid.

Title: Daily mean surface dust aerosol
Description: This is the daily mean for dust aerosol mass mixing ratio in lowest model layer

Title: Y-Component of Sea-Ice Mass Transport
Description: Includes transport of both sea ice and snow by advection

Title: Nitrogen Mass in Below-Ground Litter (non CWD)
Description: "Content" indicates a quantity per unit area. "Litter" is dead plant material in or above the soil. It is distinct from coarse wood debris. The precise distinction between "fine" and "coarse" is model dependent. "Subsurface litter" means the part of the litter mixed within the soil below the surface. The sum of the quantities with standard names wood\_debris\_mass\_content\_of\_nitrogen, surface\_litter\_mass\_content\_of\_nitrogen and subsurface\_litter\_mass\_content\_of\_nitrogen is the total nitrogen mass content of dead plant material.

Title: Hydrometeor Effective Radius of Convective Cloud Ice
Description: alevel site time1

Title: Water Vapor Path
Description: vertically integrated through the atmospheric column
Processing Note: This table includes the 2-D variables listed in the "Amon" spreadsheet, omitting, however, the daily maximum and minimum temperatures.  All variables should be reported as synoptic fields, not daily means.

Title: turbidity
Description: turbidity of coastal runoff

Title: Rate of Change of Net Dissolved Inorganic Silicon
Description: vertical integral of net time rate of change of dissolved inorganic silicon
Processing Note: integral over upper 100 m only.

Title: H2 volume mixing ratio
Description: This is the mole fraction of molecular hydrogen (H2) in air

Title: Surface Mole Concentration of Mesozooplankton Expressed as Carbon in Sea Water
Description: carbon  concentration from mesozooplankton (20-200 um) component alone

Title: Natural Carbonate Ion Concentration
Description: Surface mole concentration (number of moles per unit volume: molarity) of the natural-analogue carbonate anion (CO3). A natural analogue is used to simulate the effect on a modelled variable of imposing preindustrial atmospheric carbon dioxide concentrations, even when the model as a whole may be subjected to varying forcings.
Processing Note: Concentrations of all 3D tracers in the uppermost ocean layer. See first table in Oyr for a complete list of these tracers.  "Tracer"  concentations should be reported even if they are diagnosed rather than prognostically calculated.

Title: Downwelling Longwave Radiation
Description: Includes also the fluxes at the surface and TOA.

Title: Ice Crystal Number Concentration of Cloud Tops
Description: Concentration 'as seen from space' over ice-cloud portion of grid cell.  This is the value from uppermost model layer with ice cloud or, if available, it is the sum over all ice cloud tops, no matter where they occur, as long as they are seen from the top of the atmosphere. Weight by total ice cloud top fraction (as seen from TOA) of each time sample when computing monthly mean.

Title: Total Vegetated Percentage Cover
Description: Percentage of grid cell that is covered by vegetation.This SHOULD be the sum of tree, grass (natural and pasture), crop and shrub fractions.

Title: Percentage Cover of Stratiform Cloud
Description: Cloud area fraction (reported as a percentage) for the whole atmospheric column due to stratiform clouds, as seen from the surface or the top of the atmosphere. Includes both large-scale and convective cloud.

Title: Surface Diffuse Downwelling Shortwave Radiation
Description: Surface downwelling solar irradiance from diffuse radiation for UV calculations.

Title: total emission rate of C2H5OH
Description: This is the total emission rate of ethanol (C2H5OH) into the atmosphere

Title: Root Distribution
Description: Root Distribution

Title: Sea Water Potential Temperature
Description: Diagnostic should be contributed even for models using conservative temperature as prognostic field.
CMIP7 Variable Groups: baseline_monthly, DAMIP_monthly, surgemip_variables, Bjerknes_Index_ENSO, paleodata_assimilation, marine_bgc_baseline, paleo_ocean_3D, DCPP_Wider, SO_BGC-cloud_ocean_monthly, fish_model_day, FireMIP_monthly, omip_scalar_fields, dynamical_downscaling_ocean_core, tipmip_baseline, omip_scalars_high_priority
Processing Note: Report on native horizontal grid as well as on a spherical latitude/longitude grid. Online mapping to depth/pressure vertical grid if depth or pressure are not native.

Title: Total Emission Rate of CO
Description: Integrate 3D emission field vertically to 2d field.

Title: Upwelling Clear-Sky, Aerosol-Free Shortwave Radiation in Bands
Description: Calculated in the absence of aerosols and clouds (following Ghan). This requires a double-call in the radiation code with precisely the same meteorology.

Title: 2m Dewpoint Temperature
Description: Dew point temperature is the temperature at which a parcel of air reaches saturation upon being cooled at constant pressure and specific humidity.

Title: Carbon Mass Flux into Atmosphere Due to All Anthropogenic Emissions of CO2 [kgC m-2 s-1]
Description: This is requested only for the emission-driven coupled carbon climate model runs.  Does not include natural fire sources but, includes all anthropogenic sources, including fossil fuel use, cement production, agricultural burning, and sources associated with anthropogenic land use change excluding forest regrowth.
Processing Note: This table includes the 2-D variables listed in the "Amon" spreadsheet, omitting, however, the daily maximum and minimum temperatures.  All variables should be reported as synoptic fields, not daily means.

Title: Carbon Mass Flux into Atmosphere Due to Grazing on Land [kgC m-2 s-1]
Description: Carbon mass flux per unit area due to grazing on land

Title: Eastward Wind
Description: Zonal wind (positive in a eastward direction).

Title: Tendency of Ocean Eddy Kinetic Energy Content Due to Parameterized Eddy Advection
Description: Depth integrated impacts on kinetic energy arising from parameterized eddy-induced advection. For CMIP5, this diagnostic was 3d, whereas the CMIP6 depth integrated diagnostic is sufficient for many purposes and reduces archive requirements.
Processing Note: 3-d time dependent field

Title: All-Sky Surface Longwave Radiative Flux Due to Dust
Description: The direct radiative effect refers to the instantaneous radiative impact on the Earth's energy balance, excluding secondary effects such as changes in cloud cover.

Title: Sea Surface Salinity
Description: Sea water salinity is the salt content of sea water, often on the Practical Salinity Scale of 1978. However, the unqualified term 'salinity' is generic and does not necessarily imply any particular method of calculation. The units of salinity are dimensionless and the units attribute should normally be given as 1e-3 or 0.001 i.e. parts per thousand.
CMIP7 Variable Groups: baseline_daily, ocean_mesoscale, fish_model_day, omip_scalar_fields, Ocean_acidification_oxygen_extremes, omip_scalars_high_priority
Processing Note: Report on the ocean horizontal native grid.

Title: All-Sky Shortwave Flux Due to Dust at Toa
Description: Instantaneous forcing is the radiative flux change caused instantaneously by an imposed change in radiative forcing agent (greenhouse gases, aerosol, solar radiation, etc.).

Title: Total Plant Nitrogen Uptake (Sum of Ammonium and Nitrate) Irrespective of the Source of Nitrogen
Description: The uptake of nitrogen by fixation: nitrogen fixation means the uptake of nitrogen gas directly from the atmosphere.

Title: Number Concentration Coarse Mode Aerosol
Description: includes all particles with diameter larger than 1 micron

Title: Time Varying Gridbox thickness at t-points
Description: The time varying thickness of the gridboxes computed on the t-points

Title: Geothermal Heat Flux Beneath Land Ice
Sea Level Pressure
Description: Sea level pressure

Title: Tendency of Sea Water Potential Temperature Expressed as Heat Content Due to Parameterized Mesoscale Diffusion
Description: Tendency of heat content for a grid cell from parameterized mesoscale eddy diffusion. Reported only for models that use potential temperature as prognostic field.

Title: Dissolved Inorganic Carbon-13 Concentration
Description: Dissolved inorganic 14carbon (CO3+HCO3+H2CO3) concentration

Title: Specific Humidity
Description: Specific humidity is the mass fraction of water vapor in (moist) air.

Title: Ambient Aerosol Optical Thickness at 550nm
Description: AOD from ambient aerosols (i.e., includes aerosol water).  Does not include AOD from stratospheric aerosols if these are prescribed but includes other possible background aerosol types. Needs a comment attribute "wavelength: 550 nm"
CMIP7 Variable Groups: radiativeforcing_monthly, SO_BGC-cloud_atmos_composition_monthly, DAMIP_monthly, aerchemmip_2d_monthly, CFMIP_baseline, dynamical_downscaling_core

Title: Eastward Wind
Description: Zonal wind (positive in a eastward direction).
CMIP7 Variable Groups: baseline_daily, temperature_variability_daily_lowpriority, DAMIP_daily, aerchemmip_3d_daily, DCPP_Wider, CHELSA_land_daily, CFMIP_baseline, cordex [test]
Priority 1 (CMIP6): CFMIP, CMIP, CORDEX, DAMIP, HighResMIP, VIACSAB, VolMIP

Title: Biological Nitrogen Fixation
Description: The fixation (uptake of nitrogen gas directly from the atmosphere) of nitrogen due to biological processes.

Title: Ice Water Path
Description: mass of ice water in the column divided by the area of the column (not just the area of the cloudy portion of the column). Includes precipitating frozen hydrometeors ONLY if the precipitating hydrometeor affects the calculation of radiative transfer in model.
Processing Note: This table includes the 2-D variables listed in the "Amon" spreadsheet, omitting, however, the daily maximum and minimum temperatures.  All variables should be reported as synoptic fields, not daily means.

Title: Potential Evapotranspiration
Description: water\_potential\_evapotranspiration\_flux
CMIP7 Variable Groups: temperature_variability_daily_highpriority, temperature_variability_daily_lowpriority, AgWaterCore, AgWaterExt, biodiv_land_daily, WaterResources_daily, hydro_modelling_daily, hydro_modelling_subdaily

Title: Wetland Percentage Cover
Description: Percentage of grid cell covered by wetland. Report only one year if  fixed percentage is used, or time series if values are determined dynamically.

Title: Daily Minimum Near-Surface Air Temperature
Description: minimum near-surface (usually, 2 meter) air temperature (add cell\_method attribute "time: min")
CMIP7 Variable Groups: baseline_daily, temperature_variability_daily_highpriority, synoptic_systems_high_priority, DAMIP_daily, aerchemmip_2d_daily, DCPP_Essential, paleo_land_atmosphere_surface, AgModelCoreDaily, AgModelExpandedDaily, transport_impacts_essential, HealthHeatCoreDaily, HeatHealthExpandedDaily, HealthPollutionDaily, CHELSA_land_daily, biodiv_land_daily, ISIMIPMinimalAtmos, CFMIP_baseline, cordex [test], paleo_permafrost, landice_glaciers_allfreq
Processing Note: normally report this at 2 meters above the surface
Priority 1 (CMIP6): AerChemMIP, CFMIP, CMIP, CORDEX, DAMIP, DCPP, GMMIP, GeoMIP, HighResMIP, LS3MIP, LUMIP, PAMIP, PMIP, RFMIP, VIACSAB, VolMIP

Title: Natural Carbonate Ion Concentration
Description: Surface mole concentration (number of moles per unit volume: molarity) of the natural-analogue carbonate anion (CO3). A natural analogue is used to simulate the effect on a modelled variable of imposing preindustrial atmospheric carbon dioxide concentrations, even when the model as a whole may be subjected to varying forcings.

Title: Primary Carbon Production by Phytoplankton
Description: total primary (organic carbon) production by phytoplankton
Processing Note: Concentrations of all 3D tracers in the uppermost ocean layer. See first table in Oyr for a complete list of these tracers.  "Tracer"  concentations should be reported even if they are diagnosed rather than prognostically calculated.

Title: Aerosol Backscatter Coefficient
Description: Aerosol  Backscatter at wavelength 550nm and scattering angle 180 degrees, computed from extinction and lidar ratio

Title: Primary Emission and Chemical Production of Dry Aerosol Organic Matter
Description: This is the sum of total emission of POA and total production of SOA (emipoa+chepsoa). "Mass" refers to the mass of organic matter, not mass of organic carbon alone. We recommend a scale factor of POM=1.4\*OC, unless your model has more detailed info available.  Integrate 3D chemical production and emission field vertically to 2d field.

Title: Nudging Increment of Water in Soil Moisture
Description: nudging\_increment\_in\_water\_content\_of\_soil\_layer

Title: Daily Downwelling Shortwave Flux under Sea Ice
Description: The downwelling shortwave flux underneath sea ice (always positive)
Cross-thematic group review comment: MJ: "positive direction" adjusted to match standard name,

Title: Tendency of Sea Water Conservative Temperature Expressed as Heat Content Due to Parameterized Submesoscale Advection
Description: Tendency of heat content for a grid cell from parameterized submesoscale eddy advection. Reported only for models that use conservative temperature as prognostic field.

Title: Sinking Particulate Iron Flux
Description: In accordance with common usage in geophysical disciplines, "flux" implies per unit area, called "flux density" in physics.   'Sinking' is the gravitational settling of particulate matter suspended in a liquid. A sinking flux is positive downwards and is calculated relative to the movement of the surrounding fluid.
Processing Note: Those who wish to record vertical velocities and vertical fluxes on ocean half-levels may do so. If using CMOR3 you will be required to specify artificial bounds (e.g. located at full model levels) to avoid an error exit.

Title: Surface Mole Concentration of Carbonate Ion in Equilibrium with Pure Aragonite in Sea Water
Description: Near surface mole concentration (number of moles per unit volume: molarity) of the carbonate anion (CO3) for sea water in equilibrium with pure Aragonite. Aragonite (CaCO3) is a mineral that is a polymorph of calcium carbonate.

Title: Ocean Barotropic Mass Streamfunction
Description: Streamfunction or its approximation for free surface models. See OMDP document for details.
Processing Note: Report on native horizontal grid as well as on a spherical latitude/longitude grid.

Title: Surface Dissolved Inorganic Carbon-13 Concentration
Description: Dissolved inorganic 14carbon (CO3+HCO3+H2CO3) concentration

Title: Near-Surface Wind Speed
Description: near-surface (usually, 10 meters) wind speed.

Title: Convective Rainfall Rate
Description: Convective Rainfall rate

Title: Sea Surface Height Above Geoid
Description: This is the dynamic sea level, so should have zero global area mean. It should not include inverse barometer depressions from sea ice.
CMIP7 Variable Groups: baseline_monthly, DAMIP_monthly, Hadley_Walker_Circulations, DCPP_Essential, paleo_ocean, SO_BGC-cloud_ocean_monthly, fish_model_core_mon, transport_impacts_essential, omip_scalar_fields, dynamical_downscaling_ocean_core, tipmip_baseline, omip_scalars_high_priority
Processing Note: See OMDP document for details. Report on native horizontal grid as well as on a spherical latitude/longitude grid.

Title: Sea-Ice Snow Mass North
Description: Total mass of snow on sea ice of all Northern-Hemisphere grid cells

Title: Carbon Mass in Model Soil Pool
Description: Carbon mass in the full depth of the soil model.
CMIP7 Variable Groups: c4mip_land_cn_cycle_monthly, DCPP_Wider, c4mip_land_carbon_cycle_tier1, AgCarbon, FireMIP_monthly, ref_land_and_landice, paleo_permafrost

Title: Sea-Ice Mass Change Through Bottom Melting
Description: The rate of change of sea ice mass through melting at the ice bottom divided by grid-cell area

Title: Daily Dry Deposition Rate of NOy
Description: Daily Dry Deposition Rate of NOy

Title: Virtual Salt Flux into Sea Water Due to Rainfall
Description: zero for models using real water fluxes.
Processing Note: Report on native horizontal grid.

Title: PARASOL Reflectance
Description: PARASOL Reflectance

Title: Eastward gridbox length at u points
Description: The width of the ocean model gridbox in at the u-point (dx)

Title: Near-Surface Relative Humidity
Description: The relative humidity with respect to liquid water for T> 0 C, and with respect to ice for T<0 C.

Title: Daily mean surface sulfate aerosol
Description: This is the daily mean for sulfate aerosol mass mixing ratio in lowest model layer

Title: Mass Fraction of Cloud Liquid Water
Description: Calculated as the mass of  cloud liquid water in the grid cell divided by the mass of air (including the water in all phases) in the grid cell.  This includes precipitating hydrometeors ONLY if the precipitating hydrometeors affect the calculation of radiative transfer in model.

Title: Product of Air Temperature and Northward Wind
Description: Product of air temperature and northward wind

Title: Wet Diameter Mode Coarse Insoluble
Description: Emission from a primary source located anywhere within the atmosphere, including at the lower boundary (i.e. the surface of the earth).

Title: Carbonate Ion Concentration
Description: Mole concentration (number of moles per unit volume: molarity) of the carbonate anion (CO3).

Title: Tendency of Sea Water Salinity Expressed as Salt Content Due to Parameterized Eddy Advection
Description: Tendency of salt content for a grid cell from parameterized eddy advection (any form of eddy advection).
Processing Note: Report on native horizontal grid. Online mapping to depth/pressure vertical grid if depth or pressure are not native.

Title: Tropospheric ozone volume mixing ratio due to stratosphere-troposphere exchange (STE)
Description: Ozone tracer intended to map out strat-trop exchange (STE) of ozone in the troposphere. It represents the ozone volume mixing ratio in the troposphere that is considered to be stratospheric in origin. It should be consistent with definition of tropopause used to calculate the pressure of the tropopause (ptp). It should have zero values in the stratosphere and non-zero positive values in the troposphere.

Title: Surface upward latent heat flux
Description: Hourly surface upward latent heat flux

Title: Downward Heat Flux at Sea Water Surface
Description: This is the net flux of heat entering the liquid water column through its upper surface (excluding any "flux adjustment") .
CMIP7 Variable Groups: baseline_monthly, aerchemmip_2d_monthly, DCPP_Essential, paleo_cryosphere, SO_BGC-cloud_ocean_monthly, DAMIP_monthly, tipmip_baseline, landice_glaciers_allfreq, paleo_cryosphere_high_priority
Processing Note: Report on native horizontal grid as well as remapped onto a latitude/longitude grid.

Title: Ocean Mixed Layer Thickness Defined by Sigma T
Description: Sigma T is potential density referenced to ocean surface.

Title: Sea Water Surface Downward X Stress
Description: This is the stress on the liquid ocean from overlying atmosphere, sea ice, ice shelf, etc.
Processing Note: Report on native horizontal grid.

Title: Maximum Hourly Precipitation Rate
Description: Daily Maximum Hourly Precipitation Rate

Title: TOA Outgoing Clear-Sky, Aerosol-Free Longwave Radiation
Description: Flux corresponding to rlutcs resulting fom aerosol-free call to radiation

Title: Tendency of Sea Water Salinity Expressed as Salt Content Due to Residual Mean Advection
Description: The phrase "residual mean advection" refers to the sum of the model's resolved advective transport plus any parameterized advective transport. Parameterized advective transport includes processes such as parameterized mesoscale and submesoscale transport, as well as any other advectively parameterized transport. When the parameterized advective transport is represented in the model as a skew-diffusion rather than an advection, then the parameterized skew diffusion should be included in this diagnostic, since the convergence of skew-fluxes are identical (in the continuous formulation) to the convergence of advective fluxes.

Title: Eastward Wind
Description: zonal mean; hence YZT

Title: Surface Snow and Ice Refreeze Flux
Description: Mass flux of surface meltwater which refreezes within the snowpack. Computed as the total refreezing on the land ice portion of the grid cell divided by land ice area in the grid cell.

Title: Carbon Mass Flux out of Atmosphere Due to Gross Primary Production on Land [kgC m-2 s-1]
Description: The rate of synthesis of biomass from inorganic precursors by autotrophs ("producers") expressed as the mass of carbon which it contains. For example, photosynthesis in plants or phytoplankton. The producers also respire some of this biomass and the difference is referred to as the net primary production.

Title: Surface daily mean SO2
Description: This is the daily mean for SO2 volume mixing ratio in lowest model layer

Title: Tendency of Sea Water Conservative Temperature Expressed as Heat Content Due to Parameterized Mesoscale Diffusion
Description: Tendency of heat content for a grid cell from parameterized mesoscale eddy diffusion. Reported only for models that use conservative temperature as prognostic field.
Processing Note: Report on native horizontal grid. Online mapping to depth/pressure vertical grid if depth or pressure are not native.

Title: Daily Minimum Near-Surface Air Temperature
Description: monthly mean of the daily-minimum near-surface air temperature.
CMIP7 Variable Groups: baseline_monthly, aerchemmip_2d_monthly, DCPP_Essential, SO_BGC-cloud_met_monthly, FireMIP_monthly, biodiv_land_monthly, CFMIP_baseline, ref_impacts_and_adaptation
Processing Note: normally, this should be reported at the 2 meter height.

Title: Basal Temperature of Floating Ice Shelf
Description: quantity averaged over floating ice shelf

Title: Snow Internal Temperature
Description: This temperature is averaged over all the snow in the grid cell that rests on land or land ice.  When computing the time-mean here, the time samples, weighted by the mass of snow on the land portion of the grid cell, are accumulated and then divided by the sum of the weights.   Reported as "missing in regions free of snow on land.

Title: Snow Area Percentage
Description: quantity averaged over ice sheet (grounded ice sheet and floating ice shelf) only, to avoid contamination from other surfaces (eg: permafrost)

Title: Water Flux Correction
Description: Computed as the water flux into the ocean due to flux correction divided by the area of the ocean portion of the grid cell.
Processing Note: If this does not vary from one year to the next, report only a single year.  Most models now have zero water flux adjustment, in which case ignore or report zero. Report on native horizontal grid as well as mapped onto sphere.

Title: Ice Sheet Snow Internal Temperature
Description: quantity averaged over ice\_sheet (meaning grounded ice sheet and floating ice shelf) only, to avoid contamination from other surfaces (eg: permafrost)

Title: Eastward Wind
Description: Model levels or plev\_27

Title: Carbon Mass in Vegetation on Tree Tiles
Description: "Content" indicates a quantity per unit area. "Vegetation" means any plants e.g. trees, shrubs, grass. Plants are autotrophs i.e. "producers" of biomass using carbon obtained from carbon dioxide.

Title: Atmospheric Drag Coefficient
Description: Atmospheric drag coefficient that is used to calculate the atmospheric momentum drag on sea ice

Title: Multiple layer soil moisture
Description: In response to the opportunity "Accurate assessment of land-atmosphere coupling", I'm proposing a soil moisture for multiple layers in a frequency of 3hr.

Title: total emission rate of SO2 from all biomass burning
Description: This is the total emission rate of SO2 into the atmosphere from all biomass burning (natural and anthropogenic).

Title: Total Column Ozone
Description: total ozone column in DU

Title: Aerosol Optical Depth at 550nm Due to Biomass Burning
Description: total organic aerosol AOD due to biomass burning (excluding so4, nitrate BB components)

Title: Liquid Water Content of Soil Layer
Description: in each soil layer, the mass of water in liquid phase.  Reported as "missing" for grid cells occupied entirely by "sea"

Title: Snowfall Flux
Description: at surface; includes precipitation of all forms of water in the solid phase
Processing Note: This table includes the 2-D variables listed in the "Amon" spreadsheet, omitting, however, the daily maximum and minimum temperatures.  All variables should be reported as synoptic fields, not daily means.

Title: Saturated Hydraulic Conductivity
Description: Saturated Hydraulic Conductivity

Title: Surface Temperature
Description: Surface temperature (skin for open ocean)
CMIP7 Variable Groups: baseline_monthly, radiativeforcing_monthly, DAMIP_monthly, CVDP_input, aerchemmip_2d_monthly, DCPP_Essential, paleo_land_atmosphere_surface, ref_atmosphere, SO_BGC-cloud_met_monthly, FireMIP_monthly, CFMIP_baseline, paleo_permafrost, tipmip_baseline

Title: Snow Area Percentage
Description: Fraction of each grid cell that is occupied by snow that rests on land portion of cell.
CMIP7 Variable Groups: baseline_monthly, landice_global_allfreq, aerchemmip_2d_monthly, paleo_land_atmosphere_surface, CFMIP_baseline, paleo_permafrost, tipmip_extended, snow_allfreq

Title: Elemental carbon mass mixing ratio
Description: This variable represents the instantaneous surface elemental carbon Aerosol Mass Mixing Ratio at CF sites, sampled every 3 hours

Title: Total Emission Rate of Anthropogenic CO
Description: anthrophogenic  emission of CO

Title: Zonal mean air temperature
Description: Zonal mean temperature of air with the extended number of vertical levels.

Title: Total Cloud Cover Percentage
Description: Total cloud fraction

Title: Surface Downwelling Clear-Sky Shortwave Radiation
Description: Surface solar irradiance clear sky for UV calculations
CMIP7 Variable Groups: baseline_monthly, radiativeforcing_monthly, DAMIP_monthly, aerchemmip_2d_monthly, paleo_radiation_fluxes, SO_BGC-cloud_met_monthly, CFMIP_baseline

Title: Maximum Wind Speed of Gust at 100m
Description: Wind speed gust maximum at 100m above surface
Processing Note: Wind speed gust maximum at 100m above surface - hourly output

Title: Shallow Convective Mass Flux
Description: The net mass flux represents the difference between the updraft and downdraft components.  For models with a distinct shallow convection scheme, this is calculated as convective mass flux divided by the area of the whole grid cell (not just the area of the cloud).
Processing Note: Report on model half-levels (i.e., model layer bounds and not standard pressures).

Title: Aragonite Production
Description: Production rate of Aragonite, a mineral that is a polymorph of calcium carbonate. The chemical formula of aragonite is CaCO3.

Title: Eastward Wind
Description: Zonal wind (positive in a eastward direction).
Priority 1 (CMIP6): CORDEX, HighResMIP

Title: Nitrogen Production
Description: Vertically integrated biogenic nitrogen production

Title: Flux of Inorganic Carbon into Ocean Surface by Runoff
Description: Inorganic Carbon supply to ocean through runoff (separate from gas exchange)

Title: Downward Heat Flux into Snow Where Land over Land
Description: Downward heat flux at snow top

Title: Boundary Layer Depth
Description: Boundary layer depth

Title: Depth Average Potential Temperature of Upper 700m
Description: Upper 700m, 2D field

Title: Water Table Depth
Description: depth\_of\_soil\_moisture\_saturation

Title: Surface Altitude
Description: The surface called "surface" means the lower boundary of the atmosphere. Altitude is the (geometric) height above the geoid, which is the reference geopotential surface. The geoid is similar to mean sea level.

Title: Vertically Integrated Northward Dry Static Energy Transport
Description: Vertically integrated northward dry static energy transport (cp.T +zg).v (Mass\_weighted\_vertical integral of the product of northward wind by dry static\_energy per mass unit)

Title: Net Primary Production on Grass Tiles as Carbon Mass Flux [kgC m-2 s-1]
Description: Total NPP of grass in the grid cell

Title: Ambient Aerosol Optical Depth at 870nm
Description: AOD from the ambient aerosls (i.e., includes aerosol water).  Does not include AOD from stratospheric aerosols if these are prescribed but includes other possible background aerosol types. Needs a comment attribute "wavelength: 870 nm"

Title: Tendency of Sea Water Salinity Expressed as Salt Content Due to Residual Mean Advection
Description: Tendency of salt content for a grid cell from residual mean  (sum of Eulerian mean + parameterized eddy-induced)  advection.
Processing Note: Report on native horizontal grid. Online mapping to depth/pressure vertical grid if depth or pressure are not native.

Title: Sea Surface Phytoplankton Carbon Concentration
Description: sum of phytoplankton organic carbon component concentrations at the sea surface

Title: Direct Surface Albedo for Each Band
Description: The fraction of the surface direct downwelling shortwave radiation flux which is reflected. It is equivalent to the surface bidirectional reflectance at the incident angle of the incoming solar radiation and integrated over all outgoing angles in the hemisphere above the surface.  Reported in spectral frequency bands.

Title: Geopotential Height
Description: Geopotential is the sum of the specific gravitational potential energy relative to the geoid and the specific centripetal potential energy. Geopotential height is the geopotential divided by the standard acceleration due to gravity. It is numerically similar to the altitude (or geometric height) and not to the quantity with standard name height, which is relative to the surface.

Title: Surface Natural Dissolved Inorganic Carbon Concentration
Description: Dissolved inorganic carbon (CO3+HCO3+H2CO3) concentration at preindustrial atmospheric xCO2

Title: Total Emission Rate of Anthropogenic Organic Aerosol
Description: anthropogenic part of emioa

Title: Specific Humidity
Description: plev\_4

Title: Aerosol Water Mass Mixing Ratio
Description: Mass fraction is used in the construction mass\_fraction\_of\_X\_in\_Y, where X is a material constituent of Y. It means the ratio of the mass of X to the mass of Y (including X). "Aerosol" means the system of suspended liquid or solid particles in air (except cloud droplets) and their carrier gas, the air itself. "Ambient\_aerosol" means that the aerosol is measured or modelled at the ambient state of pressure, temperature and relative humidity that exists in its immediate environment. "Ambient aerosol particles" are aerosol particles that have taken up ambient water through hygroscopic growth. The extent of hygroscopic growth depends on the relative humidity and the composition of the particles.

Title: Change in Groundwater
Description: change\_over\_time\_in\_groundwater

Title: Temperature Flux Due to Rainfall Expressed as Heat Flux into Sea Water
Description: This is defined as "where ice\_free\_sea over sea"; i.e., the total flux (considered here) entering the ice-free portion of the grid cell divided by the area of the ocean portion of the grid cell.  All such heat fluxes are computed based on Celsius scale.
Processing Note: Report on native horizontal grid.

Title: Energy of Fusion
Description: Energy of fusion

Title: Abiotic Dissolved Inorganic Carbon-14 Concentration
Description: Abiotic Dissolved inorganic 14carbon (CO3+HCO3+H2CO3) concentration
Processing Note: Concentrations of all 3D tracers in the uppermost ocean layer. See first table in Oyr for a complete list of these tracers.  "Tracer"  concentations should be reported even if they are diagnosed rather than prognostically calculated.

Title: Mass of Water Containing Deuterium (1H 2H O) in Layer
Description: Water vapor path for water molecules that contain one atom of the hydrogen-2 isotope (1H 2H O)

Title: Carbon Mass Flux into Atmosphere Due to CO2 Emission from Natural Fire [kgC m-2 s-1]
Description: CO2 emissions from natural fires

Title: Northward gridbox length at u points
Description: The width of the ocean model gridbox in at the u-point (dy)

Title: TOA Outgoing Longwave Radiation 4XCO2 Atmosphere
Description: Top-of-atmosphere outgoing longwave radiation calculated using carbon dioxide concentrations increased fourfold

Title: Upward Component of Land-Ice Basal Velocity
Description: A velocity is a vector quantity. "Upward" indicates a vector component which is positive when directed upward (negative downward). "basal" means the lower boundary of the atmosphere

Title: Tropopause Air Pressure
Description: 2D monthly mean thermal tropopause calculated using WMO tropopause definition on 3d temperature

Title: TOA Outgoing Shortwave Radiation
Description: at the top of the atmosphere

Title: Sea Water Pressure at Sea Water Surface
Description: The surface called "surface" means the lower boundary of the atmosphere.  "Sea water pressure" is the pressure that exists in the medium of sea water.  It includes the pressure due to overlying sea water, sea ice, air and any other medium that may be present.
Processing Note: CMIP5 had units of dbar.  CMIP6 uses Pa. Report on native horizontal grid as well as on a spherical latitude/longitude grid.

Title: Water Flux into Sea Water Due to Sea Ice Thermodynamics
Description: computed as the sea ice thermodynamic water flux into the ocean divided by the area of the ocean portion of the grid cell.
